title: Motivational Education Program for Successful Breastfeeding

context.prior_knowledge: General Understanding of Basic Concepts of Breastfeeding
context.additional_context: Real-time interactive and virtual scenario-based education utilizing personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can perform core skills (posture, expression methods) of the initial breastfeeding stage with over 80% accuracy through VR simulation.
At the end of training, over 90% of learners rate their intention to continue breastfeeding at 4 or above on a 5-point Likert scale.
Utilizing a real-time feedback system, learners generate at least three personalized problem-solving strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
